configurations.name: Docker build and run
configurations.command: docker build -t ${workspaceFolderBasename}:localdev -f docker/Dockerfile . && docker rm -f ${workspaceFolderBasename} && docker run  -p 6753:6753 --name ${workspaceFolderBasename}  ${workspaceFolderBasename}:localdev

configurations.name: Docker build and run compose
configurations.command: docker build -t ${workspaceFolderBasename}:localdev -f docker/Dockerfile . && docker rm -f ${workspaceFolderBasename} && docker-compose -f docker/dev/docker-compose.yaml up
